clues.text: MLK, 1963: "Those who hope that the Negro needed to blow off steam and will now be content will have a rude ____"

every 12 years"

rounds.comments: (Alex: These are quotes we have obtained from the celebrities in question. It's how they are describing themselves when we said, "Give us a line to be used on Jeopardy!")

clues.text: I'm the one-time child actor who directed "Far and Away", one of the best Tom Cruise movies of 1992

rounds.text: Director & author, their 1960 rift over a new play set in the South ended "the most important... collaboration" of 20th century U.S. theater
